rooms.name: West of House
rooms.description: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.
rooms.longDescription:
You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.
There is a small mailbox here.

East.message: The door is boarded and you can't remove the boards.

rooms.name: North of House
rooms.description: You are facing the north side of a white house.
rooms.longDescription: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded up. To the north a narrow path winds through the trees.

rooms.name: South of House
rooms.description: You are facing the south side of a white house.
rooms.longDescription: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded.

rooms.name: Behind House
rooms.description: You are behind the white house.
rooms.longDescription: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in the kitchen of the white house.
rooms.longDescription: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

Down.message: You would need to be smaller to fit down the chimney.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You are in the living room.
rooms.longDescription: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, a trophy case, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room.

rooms.name: Cellar
rooms.description: You are in a dark and damp cellar.
rooms.longDescription: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.longDescription: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.longDescription: This is a forest, with trees in all directions. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description: This is a dimly lit forest.
rooms.longDescription: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description: This is a dimly lit forest.
rooms.longDescription: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

rooms.name: Clearing
rooms.longDescription: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south.
